notes_display: Thomas Tilburg| Joseph King.  Very worn condition, tape on obverse.
issue_place_s: Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, United States of America
issue_obverse_legend_s: FIFTEEN SHILLINGS. THIS BILL shall pass current for FIFTEEN SHILLINGS within the Province of Pensylvania, according to an Act of Assembly made in the 33rd Year of the Reign of King GEO. II. Dated May 1, 1760. FIFTEEN SHILLINGS.
issue_reverse_legend_s: FIFTEEN SHILLINGS. | To Counterfeit is DEATH | Printed by B. FRANKLIN, and D. HALL. 1760.
